Title: Iranian Spread
Actors: Noor-Ali Lotfi, Mehrdad Falahatger, Mansoureh Ali-Akbari, Mansouri Shir-Rafat
Plot: A counterfeit 1000 tomin bank note is passed in a bazaar. It passes through a broad cross-section of Iranian society, stopping with a pickpocket, a pomegranate seller, an abortionist, an ...
